About Projects, Talks and Articles

Bonnie Liefting

I am a PhD Student at the Centre for Systems, Dynamics, and Control. My PhD project is with Christian Bick and Kyle Wedgwood and is entitled Designing the Dynamics of Coupled Oscillators.

I am currently a visiting PhD student at the University of Southern Denmark with Kristian Debrabant.
